paper_abstract: In this paper, we present a family of rotation invariant cellular automata base on the grids {p. 3} of the hyperbolic plane with p >= 13 which have two states only and which are weakly universal. The presentation is uniform for p >= 17 and we have a specific solution for p = 13 which can trivially be extended to p >= 13.
paper_title: Universal Cellular Automata with Two States in the Hyperbolic Plane
